lyrics.text:
Ko e kakai angavaivai
‘Oku monū’ia
Ko e pule ‘o e langi
‘Oku ‘onautolu.

Pea ‘oku monū’ia
‘A e kakai tangi
‘I he’enau angahala,
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei.

He te nau fiemālie
‘I he’enau ma’u
‘A e fakamolemole
‘I honau ‘Otua.

Pea ‘oku monū’ia
‘A e anagamalū
Te nau ma’u ‘a e fonua,
‘O honau ‘Otua.

Mo e kau fiekaia,
Ki he angatonu
Pea mo e fieinu
Te nau monū’ia.

He ko e mā’oni’oni
‘A ia, ‘oku nau
Feinga ke nau lava’i,
Te nau fonu ‘i ai.
